long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Configure and quickly resize and position chrome windows to arrange your workspace. Four different window size/posision configs can be set and accessed via the shortcut (default: Ctrl + q -> 1/2/3/4).

To set a config resize and position the current window as desired.
Then click the extension and click the save button followed by a number to save the config.
